Uses of Class
org.kiji.schema.KijiSchemaTable

Packages that use KijiSchemaTable
org.kiji.schema The main package for users of Kiji Schema. 
org.kiji.schema.filter Filters used when reading data from Kiji tables. 
org.kiji.schema.impl Implementations for the main Kiji Schema classes and interfaces. 
org.kiji.schema.layout.impl Implementation for Kiji table layout management.
